required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Givinostat in Duchenne's Muscular Dystrophy Long-term Safety and Tolerability Study
clinical_study.official_title: Open Label, Long-term Safety, Tolerability, and Efficacy Study of GIVINOSTAT in All DMD Patients Who Have Been Previously Treated in One of the GIVINOSTAT Studies

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open label, long-term safety, tolerability, and efficacy study of GIVINOSTAT in all DMD (Duchenne's muscular dystrophy) patients who have been previously treated in one of the GIVINOSTAT studies.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events [Safety and Tolerability]
primary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: Type, incidence, and severity of treatment related/not related adverse events(AEs) and serious adverse event (SAEs)

arm_group.description: Givinostat oral suspension (10 mg/mL) twice daily in a fed state
